ch.iserver.ace.application.preferences
Class JDKPreferencesStore

java.lang.Object
  ch.iserver.ace.application.preferences.AbstractPreferencesStore
      ch.iserver.ace.application.preferences.JDKPreferencesStore
All Implemented Interfaces:
PreferencesStore, EventListener, PreferenceChangeListener
public class JDKPreferencesStore
extends AbstractPreferencesStore
implements PreferenceChangeListener

PreferencesStore implementation based on java.util.prefs.

Constructor Detail

JDKPreferencesStore

public JDKPreferencesStore()
Creates a new JDKPreferencesStore instance. Do not forget to set the path before using this class.

JDKPreferencesStore

public JDKPreferencesStore(String path)
Creates a new JDKPreferencesStore instance using the given preferences path to store the preferences.

Parameters:
path - the preferences path
Method Detail

setPath

public void setPath(String path)
Sets the preferences path. That path specifies in which preferences node the preferences of the application are stored.

Parameters:
path - the preferences path

get

public String get(String key,
                  String def)
Description copied from interface: PreferencesStore
Gets the preference value for the given key. If the value is not defined then the given default value is used.

Specified by:
get in interface PreferencesStore
Parameters:
key - the key of the preference
def - the default value
Returns:
the value of the given preference or the default value if the preference is not defined
See Also:
